item.title: Counting the Collatz numbers
item.description: arXiv:2512.13760v2 Announce Type: replace Abstract: The counting function for the numbers satisfying the Collatz conjecture is studied. A related exponential congruence equation is investigated, yielding a method to construct its solutions from free variables, and enabling us to find at least $x^{0.3227}$ Collatz numbers in the interval $[1,x]$. The historical record is 0.84.
